---
title: "Software"
description: |
  R packages and other software developed by the group
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(magrittr)
```

```{r, results='asis'}
jsonlite::stream_in(url("https://epiforecasts.r-universe.dev/stats/descriptions"), verbose = FALSE) %>%
  dplyr::arrange(Package) %>%
  split(rownames(.)) %>%
  purrr::map(unlist) %>%
  purrr::map_chr(function(e) {
    knitr::knit_expand(
      "_software-item.Rmd", 
      Package = e[["Package"]],
      Title = e[["Title"]],
      github_url = e[["_builder.upstream"]]
    )
  }) %>%
  { knitr::knit_child(text = unlist(.), quiet = TRUE) } %>%
  cat(sep = "\n")
```
